nodes.text: The Tureen system was located in the Outer Rim Territories's Kriz sector. It contained the astronomical object Tureen VI, the origin point of the Soup People. The Soup People had a reputation for making high-quality soup.
The Tureen system was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square J-18.
